detail_desc: Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Shirt in a soft organic cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and double-layered yoke. Open chest pocket, long sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuffs.
Hooded top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Dress in a soft viscose weave with buttons at the top and long balloon sleeves with a small puff at the shoulders and narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the waist with an inset band and a tie detail at the front. Unlined.
Straight-cut blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and 3/4-length sleeves with slits and ties at the cuffs.
Wide V-neck jumper in a soft knit with low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trousers woven in a viscose blend with a high paper bag waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets and tapered legs.
Belt in imitation suede with a metal buckle and metal appliqués in the shape of shells and starfish. Width 2.5 cm.
Vest tops in soft, ribbed, organic cotton jersey with scallop-trimmed necklines and armholes. One vest top with decorative buttons at the top.
Trousers in a sturdy cotton weave with a button at the waist, fake fly, side pockets and a fake back pocket. Detachable, adjustable, elastic braces with imitation leather details.
Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow, detachable shoulder strap, flap with a magnetic fastener, and two inner compartments. Lined. Size 15x20 cm.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves, reflective details and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a ribbed trim around the neckline and short sleeves with ribbed trims. Shorts with an elasticated waist and narrow ribbing at the hems.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with side pockets and wide elastication with a drawstring at the waist. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Padded footmuff in woven fabric. Elasticated hood with ear-shaped appliqués on top, concealed zips down the front and padded cuffs that can be folded over to keep the hands warm. Fleece lining.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit with a motif on the front.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey.
Shaftless socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
High-waisted shorts in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and short slits in the sides.
Off-the-shoulder top in an airy cotton weave with elastication and a wide flounce with broderie anglaise at the top.
Slightly shorter top in soft pointelle made from a viscose blend with short, rib-trimmed sleeves and a ribbed hem.
Top in soft fabric with a motif, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Wedge-heeled leather sandals with long, braided straps that tie around the ankles and a braided jute trim around the soles. Jute insoles. Rubber soles. Platform front 4 cm. Heel 10 cm.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Shirt in soft twill made from a viscose and linen blend with a mandarin collar, press-studs down the front and a wrapover button band at the top with a decorative tab. Detachable tie belt at the waist and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Shirt in woven fabric with appliqués on the collar, concealed buttons down the front and at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Fitted sports vest top in ribbed, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.
Straight-cut jacket in pile with a large, rounded collar and zip with a round tab. Patch front pockets, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and cuffs with press-studs. Lined.
Metal hair clips in various designs. Size 4 cm.
Strapless bandeau bra in soft cotton jersey. Double layer at the top with jersey-lined cups and removable inserts, side support and a silicone trim at the top. No fasteners.

Kimono in a striped linen blend containing some Tencel™ lyocell with a concealed fastening at the front, and drawstring at the sides that creates a tapered waist. Gently dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Pyjama shirt in soft, gently draping silk with small notch lapels, covered buttons down the front, front pockets and cuffs with a seam detail.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pocket with a button, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved top in soft, lightweight wool jersey with press-studs on the shoulders and a gently rounded hem.

Short, A-line dress in woven fabric with a round, gathered neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length raglan balloon sleeves with narrow trims, and a gathered seam for added width in the skirt. Unlined.
Sleeveless top in airy, softly draping jersey with a lace-trimmed V-neck.
Small, folding hair brush with a rhinestone-decorated lid that has a mirror inside. Diameter 6.5 cm.

Knee-length dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a round neckline, concealed button placket and ties at the top. Concealed zip in one side, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.

prod_name: Beverly HW Loose Mom Fit Dnm
detail_desc: 5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and gently tapered legs.
Shorter jacket in faux fur with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front, pockets in the side seams and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and slim, tapered legs.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.

Blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Square, elasticated neckline with a scalloped trim, 3/4-length raglan sleeves with elastication and a scalloped trim at the cuffs, and an elasticated hem.
Padded jacket in a quilted weave with a detachable, lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, and front pockets with a press-stud. Lined.
Yoga top in ribbed, softly draping jersey made from a silk blend. Shoulder straps with a wrapover and open section at the back.
Trainers with lacing at the front, a padded top edge and loop at the back. Mesh linings, fabric insoles and patterned soles.
V-neck body in microfibre with lace sections. Adjustable shoulder straps, a lined gusset with press-studs and a high cut at the back.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, a scalloped neckline and puff sleeves with scalloped edges.
Three-strand necklace of metal chains in various designs. Adjustable length 38-45 cm.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a foldover top edge, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Shirt in premium cotton with a cutaway collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Varying pattern on the inside of the cuffs and collar stand. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Trousers in a soft viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist in a relaxed fit. Pockets in the side seams, a slightly lower crotch, and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Fitted, short-sleeved body in stretch jersey with a turtle neck, string back and lined gusset with press-studs.
Fitted polo-neck jumper in airy, fine-knit wool containing some cashmere with long sleeves and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Short, wide blouse in plumeti chiffon with an opening at the front and short sleeves with flared flounces. Opening and button at the back of the neck and a seam at the hem with a double flounce.
Ankle boots with peep toes and visible seams. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 9 cm.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with a grosgrain trim at the top, elastic strap over the foot and decorative bow at the front. Fabric linings and insoles.
Strapless, non-wired bandeau bra in lace and mesh with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide lace trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Bra in ribbed jersey with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Oversized jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a cowl neck, long raglan sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trousers in stretch twill made from a cotton blend. Skinny fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets, flap leg pockets and narrow hems.
Blouse in an airy, crinkled weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and flounces down the front and back. Elasticated cuffs, a seam at the waist and a gently flared peplum. Unlined.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Dungaree dress in soft cotton corduroy with adjustable straps that cross at the back and a seam at the waist with covered elastication at the back.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Short, boxy jumper in loose-knit linen with contrasting colour cotton sections. Low dropped shoulders and a raw-knit hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and ties at the sides.

All-in-one suit in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and pockets in the side seams. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved cardigan in soft, textured-knit cotton with a round neckline, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in soft sweatshirt fabric. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.

Single-breasted jacket in an Italian wool weave with notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons down the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette. For matching trousers, look for: 0507864.
Top in soft fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with embroidery around the neckline and long sleeves with a small frill trim.
Short wrap dress in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck and short sleeves. Ties at the waist and a flounce around the neckline, down the front and around the hem. Unlined.
Slim-fit jeans in stretch, supersoft twill with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Fully lined bikini bottoms. Low waist with wide elastication, and a high cut at the back.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front, ribbing around the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
